body: Hey guys, Kammy here :DIt's been a long time since I have posted on the forums, but I have been checking from time to time. Recently, I started to think that I should start building again (I did a little before) Therefore, I will, But there is one problem... I don't have a server to build on. I would love to start building as soon as possible and really hope that one of you guys might have a server where I could build maps for This amazing server (avicus) please reply :D~Kammy

title: Build server
